title: Why Is There A Sense Of Ought? | Unapologetic Episode 50
itunes:title: Why Is There A Sense Of Ought? | Unapologetic Episode 50
description: Drawing on Bobby’s P.h.D work, he explores Darwin’s explanation for why humans have a sense of ought. He also compares that to the explanation the Christian worldview offers.
